Encinitas.Encinitas station: Encinitas is a passenger rail station serving the city of Encinitas, California on North County Transit District's COASTER commuter rail route. In addition to the COASTER service, Pacific Surfliner trains also served this station between 2013 and 2017. This station is served by 4 scheduled Breeze bus routes, FLEX Route 374, and LIFT paratransit for those with disabilities.
